document_data.name: Grand University of Huzuz
document_data.source: [[City of Delights| City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grand University of Huzuz''' was a school located in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Location: The Grand University could be found in the [[Pilgrims' District]] of the City of Delights.
document_data.Inhabitants:
[[Fanya bint Parigar]] was the head of the Grand University. She employed teachers and instructors, including [[Calanti Snowdrop|Fatima Asad]], a language teacher.

The Grand University enrolled a few hundred students for a three-year course covering topics such as business, language, history, and etiquette.
document_data.Activities: Despite its name, the Grand University was actually a small school, though Fanya did have lofty aspirations that it would one day be the most respected school in all of Huzuz.
